name: p71 - 13mm Crunch Gun
notes:
"Why the generated weapon doesn't match the example in the Field Catalogue

- The manifest in the book has the base ammo capacity for a light support receiver as 30 but the rules say it should be 50 (table on p31). This results in the example having the final ammo capacity as 3 when it should be 5. This also means the magazine costs in the table are wrong.
- The manifest in the book doesn't have Quickdraw -2 for the scope accessory (p46)
- The Quickdraw -4 modifier for a Bipod doesn't apply in all circumstances, as such Auto-Jimmy shows this modifier in the notes section with details of when it's applied rather than include it in the weapons standard Quickdraw score.
- The table in the book has Lo-Pen 2 for incendiary ammo but the rules don't say that ammo type has a Penetration modifier
- The table in the book has a Damage of 6D for explosive ammo but it should be 7D. The description of explosive ammo (p51) says it adds 1D plus an additional 1D for every 3 full dice of damage. The base damage of the weapon is 5D so explosive ammo should add an additional 2D for a total of 7D.
- The table in the book has AP 3 for advanced armour piercing ammo but this doesn't seem correct. The table on p18 says "AP 1 plus 1 per full dice of damage, -1 damage per 2 full dice of damage". With a Base Damage of 5D I would expect it to be AP 6 and the final damage to be 5D-2

"
